title: LFM
body:
HELLO fellow summonses, I'm frost currently low gold but looking to get back to plat this weekend, though I'm going to climb the ladder in solo queue I really don't enjoy it. Every division is crude they're all mean and horrible to witness. I don't usually get flamed at because I'm extremely passive if I'm behind a bit and won't start feeding but I mean these team members are so nasty to each other and I have to always witness it. And I mean they're people in their mid 20's that play this game and act like they're 12 and I have a little brother who is 13 and he has like 6 of his mates that play lol we're not all 16+ so why are you guys so horrid? Anyway moving on this is why I want to start a ranked team because I can't stand solo queue anymore I main ADC but any other role that you guys play just pop down a few thing. Usually I would put down like what's ur Skype or what's ur ign in a line but I think we're all old enough to put our own details down and you can just say ur ign if you want or you can out a load of stuff like when ur available and stuff anyone I'm going to go because otherwise this will turn into a very big discussion board. 

P.s my brothers not bronze 5 his actually plat 2 :P

replies.body:
IGN: Wolves 

Anything apart from mid, kinda havent played mid in a long time

hey there i prefer playing mid and jungle
i am on pretty much anytime and im currently gold 4

IGN: ShinySoulStar

hey, 
i can do most role but i prefer playing tank/bruisers 
top and jungler.

just add me on league and i will give you more details if you are interested.

Hay 
IGN -vbulldogz
Prefs- mid jungle adc 
really keen to enhance my gaming with a team :) 
cheers,
